Liver.hepatics: The hepatic parenchyma appears diffusely echogenic.
Liver.contour: The contour of the liver is smooth.
Liver.focal_mass: There is no focal liver mass.
Liver.portal_vein: The main portal vein is patent with hepatopetal flow.

Bile Ducts.biliary_dilation: There is no intrahepatic biliary dilation.

Gallbladder.stone: There is a 2.5 cm shadowing stone within the lumen of the gallbladder.
Gallbladder.gallbladder_condition: The gallbladder is distended but otherwise unremarkable without pericholecystic fluid or wall thickening.

Pancreas.visualization: Pancreas is not well visualized due to overlying bowel gas.
Pancreas.condition: Near the head is grossly unremarkable.

Kidneys.echogenicity: Normal cortical echogenicity and corticomedullary differentiation is seen bilaterally.
Kidneys.conditions: There is no evidence of masses, stones, or hydronephrosis in the kidneys.

Retroperitoneum.visualization: Visualized portions of aorta and IVC are within normal limits.

laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Lactate levels decreased from 4.1 to 3.9 after administration of fluids.
